short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage a collection of tabs as workspaces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions will save all currently opened tabs into a workspace. You can name the workspace and tag it with description. Then you can browse saved workspaces, and launch the tabs in new windows.
